title: 20: The Trader Joe's Episode: Our Favorite Things (Part 1)
itunes:title: The Trader Joe's Episode: Our Favorite Things (Part 1)
description: If you LOVE Trader Joe’s (and who doesn’t), this episode is for you! Get ready, because Lisa shares her favorite healthy TJ’s items from the produce aisle to the freezer aisle! Part 1 of this special two-parter focuses on MEALS: ready-to-eat options, top ingredients, and more. Plus, the gang flips over several products they taste test. So grab your pads and pens, and maybe gas up the car, because you’ll be heading to Trader Joe’s immediately after you hear this episode! [www.hungry-girl.com/foodcast](http://hungry-girl.com/foodcast)
